remarks: In a closure system in which directed unions of closed sets are closed, closure commutes with directed unions.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Apr-2015.)
statement:
acsdrscl.f $e |- F = ( mrCls ` C ) $.
isacs4lem $p |- ( ( C e. ( Moore ` X ) /\ A. s e. ~P C ( ( toInc ` s ) e. Dirset -> U. s e. C ) ) -> ( C e. ( Moore ` X ) /\ A. t e. ~P ~P X ( ( toInc ` t ) e. Dirset -> ( F ` U. t ) = U. ( F " t ) ) ) ) $.
$d C s t $.
$d F s t $.
$d X s t $.
